<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/group/user/{userid}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of groups for the user with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"userid","in":"path","description":"The user ID.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of groups","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"The group ID.","format":"uuid","example":"{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000}"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The group name.","nullable":true,"example":"Group Name"},"manager":{"type":"string","description":"The group manager.","nullable":true,"example":"Jake.Zazhitski"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The group summary parameters.","title":"GroupSummaryDto"}},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"GroupSummaryArrayWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
